title: Nursing Simulation-Based Patient Safety and Fundamental Skills Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Enhancing emergency nursing competencies for general community members using smartphone-based VR simulation tools

learning_goals: Learners perform basic nursing skills (blood pressure measurement, wound care, etc.) with 80% accuracy in a simulation environment.
Learners apply communication principles (active listening, etc.) in virtual patient scenarios to achieve over 90% patient satisfaction.
Learners apply patient safety protocols (infection control, fall prevention) 100% in simulation assessments.

resources: Low-Specification PCs (3 Units for Administrative Use)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
